channel.title: Page on open collector
channel.description: Recent content in Page on open collector

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m David. I also go by dave/davidk. I work on cloud tooling and cloud infrastructure (starting from bare metal on up), mostly tailored to all things Linux. This page is a collection of projects I do, time permitting: mostly consisting of software, electronics and 3D printables. Software GitHub has a bunch of pieces of code i’ve written over the years. It’s all in various formats/versions of Go, Ruby, C, Bash, Python and/or Perl.
